headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KUWAYAMA, FUMIKO AKABANE

snippet: KUWAYAMA--Fumiko Akabane, 84, on May 1, after a lifetime of gracious kindnesses. Beloved sister of Masako Dougherty, Asako and Seiichiro Akabane; treasured aunt; and devoted friend. Predeceased by her husband Kelly. Services in Washington, DC on June 16, 2016 by Joseph Gawler's Sons. In lieu of flowers, gifts to PetSmart Charities (petsmartcharities.org) welcomed. 1/3

Predeceased by her husband Kelly. Services in Washington, DC on June 16, 2016 by Joseph Gawler's Sons. In lieu of flowers, gifts to PetSmart Charities (petsmartcharities.org) welcomed. 1/3
